QuestData.Title: A Crocolisk Tale
QuestData.Description: How could this crocolisk have grown so large?$b$bCertainly, rumors exist of very old crocolisks that have grown to enormous sizes... but this female can't be more than a dozen years old.$b$bPerhaps someone in New Cifera can shed some light on the subject.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Enormous Crocolisk Tail to Yan at New Cifera in the Valley of the Four Winds.
